meanings.definition: Showing a tendency to be irritable or short-tempered.
meanings.sent1: After a long day, she felt chippier than usual.
meanings.sent2: His chippier mood made it hard to have a calm conversation.
meanings.sent3: When he's hungry, he becomes even chippier than a grumpy cat!
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds gathered, matching his chippier demeanor.
meanings.sent5: Her chippier attitude was like a prickly cactus, ready to snap at any moment.

meanings.definition: A person who is irritable or short-tempered.
meanings.sent1: The chippier in the office always complains about everything.
meanings.sent2: Dealing with a chippier can be quite challenging at times.
meanings.sent3: The little chippier at the party refused to share his toys.
meanings.sent4: She avoided the chippier at the store to keep her mood positive.
meanings.sent5: The old man was known as the neighborhood chippier, always grumbling about something.
